title: Look for a team
body:
Look for a team that can work well together.

Looking for a (sup) (adc) (top) (mid)
If anyone wants to fill any of these rows please msg.

Please have abit of experience in these rows.

I am looking for people who do not rage quit or be salty or be toxic.

replies.body: I can sup and top, but I like to mid most of all.  SN: RebirthKnight
Hi, I main support, but can play adc or top if needed. add me names is sneakzp
